activities: One Network receives personal data from the E.U. obtained from visitors to One Network's website and from prospective and current customers of One Network. The information collected includes name, job title, business contact information,and information related to product and product services preferences. One Network uses this information for customer service, software and applications support, website content selection,and marketing.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer and employee data and website user data are covered by the Safe Harbor framework and are processed on-line, off-line, and manually.
recoursemech: For unresolved complaints, One Network will cooperate with the European Union data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
